div.p:
Curia legalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio coram alexandro de camera preposito et Jacobo cuming
vno balliuorum eiusdem burgi octauo die mensis Junij anno Domini et cetera lxxviijo / quo die sectis
vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent in Rotulo sectarum

The quhilk day comperit personaly in plane court Dauid crukschank and William
fichet burgessis of the said burgh / and the said Dauid producit certane lettres and eui
dentis made til him be the said William that is tosay / ane chartir of plane
selling vndir the said Williamis seil of al and sindri his landis annuel rentis croftis
and tenementis in the burgh of abirdene or within the fredom of the same burgh til the said
William heritably pertenand and namely of his hail tenement with the pertinens
liand in the ovirkirkgate on the north part of the same gate betuix the lande
of Adam of crafurd . on the west part and the land of the ayris of vmquhile
Wil rolland on the eest part with the yard and tail of the same tobe haldin and
had til the said Dauid crukschank his ayris and assignais in fee and heritage
for evyr Item a lettre of procuratoury vndir the said William fichetis seil . for
him and in his name til wpgif and purely and simply resing in the handis of
ane of the balyeis of abirdene for the tyme al and sindri his landis annuel rentis
croftis and tenementis with the pertinens til the said William pertenand and liand within
the said burgh of aberdene / and namly his tenement with the pertinens and yarde of the
same before expremyt liand in the ovirkirkgate of abirdene / for sesyne and
possession' heritably tobe gevin and deliuerit til the said David crukschank eftir
the tenour of the said chartir Item a letter testimonial vndir the seil of alxr alexander
rede ane of the balyeis of abirdene in that tyme makand mencione of the
sesyne and possession' gevin be the said balye til Dauid crukschank eftir
the resignacion made be arthur of forbes ane of the said William fichetis
procuratouris tharto be his said lettre of procuratoury vndir his seil specialy constitute
that is tosay of thre litil croftis togiddir and collateraly liand . within the saide
burgh betuix the croft of androw murray on the north part / and the croft of
Robert of culan on the south part / and of the land and tenement before expremyt
liand in the ovirkirkgate / The quhilkis lettres the said Dauid crukschank
gerd the clerk rede opinly in the court in presence of the said William fichet and
of Jonet fichet his doghtir tobe affermyt thare be him becaus' of the re
hers that was made of the said Williamis discess' before his here cuming
in this lande / the quhilkis lettres being red the said William fichet ratifijt
and approvit the said chartir and procuratour in al thingis contenit in thaim and that it wes his
awne propir seil that was appensit til ilkane of thame / and rychtsua affer
mit the said sesyne and possession' gevin be the balye til the said Dauid cruke
schank eftir the tenour and fourme of the resignacion and chartir made tharwpon witnes
the hail court . et cetera

the same day the aldirman and balye assignit til ser alexander teman the morn xv
dais the xxiij day of June til answer' til gilbert of chavmer anent the cla
me and debate of xx s' of annuale and a sellar' as law wil .

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per Andream branche vnum ballivorum eiusdem
xiijo die Junij anno Domini et cetera lxxviijo

Quo die murdacus glenmalvyne plegius pro Johanne Walkar super quem Ranaldus
talyour porrexit plegium in manu Duncanj stralogh vnius sergeandorum pro
iniusta negacione et detencione octo petrarum lane agnine ab eodem Ranaldo primo
die vocatus ad intrare faciendum dictum Johannem in curia Non comparuit nec ipsum
Johannem comparere fecit Ideo precipitur sergeando capere districtum de dicto plegio et cetera

Eodem die comparentibus postea prenominatis partibus in curia coram Roberto blindsel et andrea branch
ballivis / Johannes Walkar prosecutus per Ranaldum talyour de octo petris lane ag
nine expresse negavit huiusmodi debitum Vnde assisa desuper electa et iurata matu
reque auisata parcium proporcionibus et racionibus auditis et intellectis decreuit et ordinauit
murthacum glenmalvine plegium dicti Johannis Walkar' soluere debere prefato
Ranaldo quadraginta solidos vsualis monete mutuatos per ipsum Johannem ab eodem
Ranaldo / quos antedictis murthacus obtulit soluisse ipsi Ranaldo ex parte Johannis Wal
kar' in festo beati michaelis preterito Et tempore Johannes quitus de lana eo quod prefatus mur
dacus ex deliberacione assise iuravit se habuisse dictos xl s' paratus quando eos
offerebat Ricardo talyour ex parte Johannis Walkar' predicti / quare precipitur dicto murthaco ad
satisfaciendum dicto Ranaldo de xl s' infra terminum Juris et ad hoc faciendum seriandus ex mandato
ballivorum oneravit ipsum quod non exiret de pretorio quousque inueniret plegium

The same dai Robert symson dwelland in byrs the quhilk Robert bur
nat gerd be attachit of before be Duncan stralogh seriand for iij s' ij d'
acht til him be the same Robert symson as he saide Comperit before the
saidis balyeis in the court as to the day assignit til him be his party as
he allegit / and producit til prefe and witnes ser William Donaldson and
Johne necolson in byrs / quhilkis sworn concordialy rehersit and deponit
that John of glendinewyn officiar' of byrs' to my lord of Abirdene
arrestit the saidis iij s' and ij d' for det acht be the said Robert burnet
til Donald the ross' / quharfor Robert symson protestit that his borowis
be fred anent the said Robert burnet / And that he is quyte of his cla
me in tyme tocum throu the said Robert burnatis awne condicion as he al
legis / And the same Robert symson has constitute ser William Donaldsone
his procuratour for the production' of witnes' anent the said condicion and in al vthir
thingis concerning the said action / promittand to hald ferme and stable et cetera

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio coram ballivis eiusdem decimoquinto die mensis
Junij Anno Domini millesimo quadringentesimo septuagesimo octauo

Quo die Alanus smyth conuictus per assisam adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento curie pro
iniusta perturbacione vxoris Walteri aghneif et sponse Wilelmj futhes filie dicti
Walteri in verbo et emendabit eisdem prout Jura volunt Et similiter vxores dictorum
Walteri et Willelmi amerciantur pro perturbacione prefati Alanj verbotenus et tenetur emendare ut supra

Jacobus smyth filius dicti alanj adiudicatur in amerciamento quia intrauit terram Willelmi futhes et pertur
bauit nutricem eiusdem Wilelmj iniuste prout deliberatum fuit per assisam

Eodem die magnus Wormot deuenit plegius legalis pro michaele thome magistrimagistro
cuiusdam nauis de copmanhavyn quod gilbertus riburne erit indempnis aliter quod Jus requirit

Et dictus gilbertus riburn inuenit Willelmum blindsele seniorem plegium legalem pro eo de indemp
nitate prefati michaelis aliter quam quod Jura volunt

Die xviija mensis Junij anno predicto In curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio Alexander trail inuenit Willelmum
blinsel seniorem plegium legalem pro eo de indempnitate Roberti bughane aliter quam Jura
volunt Et eodemmodo thomas prat deuenit plegius pro dicto Roberto de indempnitate alexandri trail

The quhilk day philp of Dunbrek ane of the sergeandis of Abirdene producit thir persons
that is tosay Johne malisson Stevyn giffard and James Kemp before the
aldirman and ballies sittand in Jugement The quhilkis persons sworn deponit that
thai war present and for witnes tane / quhen the said philp warnit and char
git Dauid crukschank personaly apprehendit tocompere this instant day
before the aldirman and balyeis tosee the execucion of our souerane lordis lettres
eftir the tenour of the same anent ane Inquisicion tobe tane of the said Dauid
tweching the breking of law borowis betuix the said Dauid and thomas
symson and til excep agane ony suspect persons passand wpon the said inquisicion
The quhilk Dauid beand thrise callit comperit nocht / quharfor the aldir
man and balyeis chargit the said philp seriand of mare habundance towarn
and charge the said Dauid til entir before thaim in the tolbuthe on the morne
in the houre of caus' til here and see the execucion of our soueran lordis lettres
be made concerning the said Inquisicion eftir the tenour of our forsaid soueran
lordis lettres

Item eodem die Johannes narne manucepit ad legittime probandum quod illa terra Willelmi ade patris
suj iacente prope portam vici castri ex parte australi eiusdem vici ipsi Johanni assedatur per
dictum patrem suum vsque ad festum penthicostes proximo venturo / et ad hoc probandum ballivi as
signaverunt eidem hodie ad quindenam

The same day William adameson oblist him and promittit to the aldirman and balyeis
in the court that he sal nothir sel analy nor wedset na landis of the quhilkis
he is in possession' this instant day withoute the consale and consent of Robert of
bughan burges of this burgh than present and forspekar' to the said William

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio coram preposito et ballivis eiusdem xixno die
mensis Junij anno Domini et cetera lxxviijo /

quo die subscripti electi fuerunt in Inquiscionem
de mandato litterarum domini nostri Regis de et super infrictione plegiorum legalium inter
thomam symson et Dauid crukschank videlicet Johannes de mar Dauid colison
Johannes de Knollis alexander rede alexander howison Dauid mathoson thomas prat
Jacobus craik alexander trail alexander nachty et alexander scrogis / qui Jurati et inter
se bene et mature auisati parcium allegacionibus et racionibus auditis et intel
lectis inuenerunt et decreuerunt / quod dictus Dauid crukschanke fuit infric
tor plegiorum legalium super dictum thomam symson et de hoc nequeunt eum
acquietare

In curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio per Willelmum hay vnum ballivorum eiusdem xxmo
die mensis Junij predicti / Johannes skynnar' plegius pro Willelmo besat super quem Duncanus
byrs extendit plegium in manu philippi Dunbrek seriandi pro iniusta detencione
duarum bollarum et vnius firlote farine ab eodem Duncano / primo die vocatus
ad comparere faciendum dictum Willelmum responsurus dicto plegio Non comparuit / quare precipitur serien
do capere districtum de dicto plegio et cetera et premunire ipsum ad intrare faciendum prefa
tum Willelmum hodie ad xvnam tanquam secundo die processus testibus patricio badenach patre
andrea atkyn Johanne symson et diuersis aliis

Memorandum that on mydsummir day the xxiiij dai of June the yer' of god M iiijc lxxviij yeris
It is appointit and accordit betuix gilbert the Waus' and meg cryne anent
the payment of twa hambre barellis of salmond quhilkis the said gilbert
has pait til Johne Wormot on the behalf of the said meg in the quhilkis
twa barellis scho was bundin til the said John' as in the Act contenit in this
buke mare fullely is expremyt / that becaus' the said meg plegit hir land
liand in the schipraw til the forsaid John' Wormot with state and possession'
for the payment of the saidis twa barellis of salmond as at lynthe is
expremyt in the said act / Now as than / the said meg has plegit hir for
said land til gilbert the Waus forsaid with state and possession and in sic like
maner in al poyntis as it was plegit til John' Wormot of before / ffor
the saidis twa hambre barellis of salmond ful rede and swete Tobe
pait til the said gilbert his ayris executouris or assignais within xxj dais
nixt tocum And failyeand of the payment of the said salmond within the said tym
than the said lande sal remayn heritably with the said gilbert the Waus
his ayris executouris and assignais but ony reuocacion / he or thai payande
til the said meg cryne hir ayris executouris or assignais fyve pundis
of vsual mone togiddir with the saidis twa barellis of salmond tobe allowit
for the hail payment of the said land witnes' heirof John' Wormot Wil
liame of Kintor mawnus Wormot and patrik badenagh the son'
Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio coram ballivis eiusdem xxv die Junij anno predicto

quo die Willelmus Wentoune posuit se in voluntate ballivorum de amerciamento curie pro iniusta
perturbacione Johannis seruitorum cristinj myln' et tenetur emendare eidem ut Jura volunt

Die xxvj mensis predicti in curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio / Stephanus nauta accusatus
de graui lesione Willelmi blindsele seruitoris Dauid colison' posuit se in vo
luntate prepositi et ballivorum de dicta calumpnia vnde adiudicatus fuit in amerciamento curie
et ad emendum parti lese vt Jura volunt

Eodem die Joneta Dyse conuicta per assisam amerciatur pro arte et parte lesionis et pertur
bacionis predicti Willelmi blindsele precipiendo prefatum stephanum quatenus percuteret ipsum
Willelmum tempore dicte lesionis et tenetur emendare dampnum secundum quod Jura volunt /
et si inueniatur ammodo quod taliter delinquat assisa ordinavit quod exuletur de villa / et quod me
dio tempore remoueat de loco vbi nunc degit

Eodem die comparens in Judicio coram preposito ballivis et consulibus dicti burgi protribunali sedentibus
in pretorio eiusdem Willelmo fichet burgense dicti burgi / qui perlegi fecit quedam
Acta contenta in libro curiarum dicti burgi / penes resignacionem et possessionem
omnj terrarum suarum croftorum et annuarum Reddituum de quibus alias infeodavit
Jonetam fichet filiam et heredem suam / ante eius recessum de patria / Quibus
quidem Actis perlectis Idem Willelmus non vi aut metu ductus nec errore lapsus aut
circumuentus sed suo proprio motu tactis sacris dei ewangeliis Juramentum prestitit
corporale quod non fuit coactus aut compulsus ad huiusmodi facienda / qui quidem Willelmus
approbauit confirmavit et ratificavit huiusmodi Acta alias per ipsum facta in omnibus
suis punctis et articulis affirmans dictam Jonetam filiam suam verum possessorem
omnj terrarum suarum croftorum et annuorum reddituum Et licet alias Dauid
crukschank ex falsa relacione et suggestione sibi indicavit et se informavit
quod dicta Joneta filia sua fuit in preposito alienandj dictas terras et crofta
in fraudem dampnum et preiudicium heredum suorum sibi dicto Dauid et quod nichil caruit
nisi eius consensu et quod hoc sibi Juravit quod dicta Joneta fichet dedit sibi David
et sponse sue huiusmodi terras crofta et annuos redditus / Et ex huiusmodi falsa
relacione sibi prebuit eius assensum et consensum vt ipse Dauid et sponsa sua
habeant et possideant dictas terras cum croftis Ad quod consensijt pro tunc quam in eo
fuit licet de Jure non debeat visis dictis actis et intellegis Quare dictus
Willelmus solempniter reuocavit irritavit et annullauit omnes et singulas condiciones et
concessiones litteras cartas et euidencias desuper factas qualitercumque / discernens
illas nullius esse roboris aut momenti / quia ex falsa relacione et suggestione
ut premittitur erant confect' Super quibus thomas symson pro se et dicta Joneta
sponsa sua peciit publicum Instrumentum a domino Roberto leis notario publico Coram hiis
testibus Alexandro de camera preposito Roberto blindsel Willelmo hay Jacobo cummyne ballivis
Johanne de Knollis Dauid colison' alexandro rede Dauid menyes gilberto vaus'
Johanne vaus Dauid mar' Willelmo blindsele seniore Willelmo blindsele iuniore
Johanne colison' Willelmo quelp gilberto morison' et patricio badenagh filio scriptore
eiusdem acti et curie pro tempore cum multis aliis

Vltimo die Junij anno et cetera lxxviijo Alexander menyes deuenit plegius legalis pro Johanne Waus
fratre gilberti / quod gilbertus de camera erit indempnis pro eo aliter quam per viam Juris
Et eodemmodo gilbertus de camera inuenit Willelmum blindsele seniorem plegium pro eo de indempnita
te dicti Johannis Waus ut supra

Die tercia mensis Julij anno predicto Dauid prat inuenit Johannem stevynson' plegium legalem
pro eo quod magister Willelmus anffray erit indempnis aliter quam per viam Juris

Eodem die thomas fife deuenit plegius legalis pro dicto magistro Willelmo de indemp
nitate predicti Dauid prat aliter quam Jura volunt

MemorandumThis entry has been added at the bottom of the page. that the thrid day of the said moneth of Jule John' of mar Robert of culan alexander rede David symson
thomas fif alexander howison gilbert vaus' John the vaus David menyes John Wormot Wil blindsel yungar thom prat
David mathoson John stevinson androw murra eldar Wat achneif and thom simson chosin and sworn' in ane Inquest / fand
and deliuerit that Alexander of chavmer aldirman John of Knollis Robert blindsel and Androw rede of badfothellis ar
quyte of the breking of the kingis command and dissobeying of his lettres et cetera wpon the quhilk action the
fornemit persons war foloit be Adam bachiler

iiijto die mensis Julij predicti Robertus prat coram preposito et ballivis dedit thomam prat
plegium legalem pro ipso quod magister Willelmus anffray erit indempnis aliter quam per viam
Juris et eodemmodo Andreas scherar' deuenit plegius legalis pro predicto magistro Willelmo
de indempnitate dicti Roberti prat aliter quam per viam Juris

The same dai comperand in Jugement William fichet adnullit his awne
propir seil quhilk he left with vmquhile Robert gillespy in keping the
quhilk seil Dauid crukschank tuke fra the said Robertis wif eftir
the deces' of the said Robert in preiudice of the said Williamis laghful
ayris and thare possessionis as the said William presumys The quhilk
seil and al vthir selis chartiris euidentis resignacionis procuratouris and
contractis quhatsumevyr made be the said William fichet til the said
Dauid crukschank or ony vthiris . sen the tym that he put Jonet fichet
his doghtir in the fee state and possession' of al and sindri his landis
croftis and annuel rentis within the burgh and the fredome of Abirdene
he Reuokis and has reuokit adnullis cassis and of na vail discernys
the forsaid Selis euidentis chartiris contractis resignacionis and bandis
quhatsumevyr made to the said Dauid or ony vthiris And ratifeis
approvis and confermys the state and possession' gevyn til the said .
Jonet fichet his doghtir eftir the tenour of the actis contenit in the common buke of
Abirdene before thir witnes Alexander of chavmer aldirman Alexander menyes James
cumming androw branch twa of the balyeis Androw scherar' John' of Knollis
alexander rede Dauid menyes Adam bachiler' messinger Dauid mathosoune
and ser Robert leis notar' philp of Dunbrek sergeand and thom talyour dempstar'
with vthir sindri

Eodem die in curia coram Willelmo haye vno ballivorum Johannes skynnar plegius pro Willelmo
besat secundo die vocatus ad intrandum eundem Willelmum ad sectam Duncanj byrs vt patet in processu
primi diei / non comparuit et cetera

Curia legalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio coram preposito et ballivis eiusdem
sexto die Julij anno Domini et cetera lxxviijo

Quo die decretum et ordinatum fuit per assisam quod gilbertus de camera restau
raret et iterum deliberaret nauium alias per eum receptum de terra magistri
thome vaus precentoris morauenisis / et quod Juridice prosequatur Jus suum si quod
habet coram Judice suo ordinario penes annuum redditum xx s' et vnum sellarium
clamatum per ipsum de terra dicti magistri thome

Eodem die compertum est per certas personas electas inter Willelmum blindsele iuniorem
et Alexandrum sanchare / quod le lotting siluer bonorum dicti Willelmi de quibus ipse Alexander
mercator erat in Anglia soluj debet de moneta regnj socie et non anglie
et hoc deliberarunt per modum assise / et hoc de bonis carcatis in naue dicti
alexandri veniente de anglia ad leith in scocia

Item eodem die magister thomas vaus precentor morauiensis inuenit thomam symson' plegium
legalem pro eo quod gilbertus de camera erit indempnis aliter quam per viam Juris
Et alexander trail deuenit plegius legalis pro dicto gilberto de indempnitate prefati magistri thome et cetera

In the balye court haldin in the tolbuthe the xvij day of Jule the yer' before
writin It wes fundin and deliuerit be ane sworn' assise that Alexander trail is
dettour and suld content and pay til Alexander of chavmer aldirman in the name of the
toune iij li' v s' ij d' ob' for the martymes mail last bigane of ane
half nettis fisching of the Raik quhilk the said alexander occupiit

The xxj dai of Jule the yer' et cetera lxxviij yeris Alexander meignes in presence of
the consel and vthiris of the quhilkis the namys ar vndirwritin grauntis him
tilhaf ressauit fra Alexander of chavmer aldirman in the tyme twenty
markis of vsual money of the Realme in part of payment of the
some' of ane hundreth markis acht til him for the redeming of the toune
of Bogfarlow / the said Alexander protestand that it suld nocht turne him til na
preiudice anent the ressauing of the foure score of merkis restand vn
pait quhilkis suld be pait til him al togiddir and at anys apon a day eftir
the tenour of the evident made til him tharwpon' And thir ar the namys of the
consel and vthiris present in the tyme Androw scherar' John' of mar thomas of cha
mour Dauid symson' Alexander howison' gilbert the vaus thomas fiffe
Adam of crafurd thom prat William blindsel eldar and yungar Alexander
rede William the hay ane of the ballies alexander naghty Alexander trail
gilbert lethe Adam androson' Dauid mathoson' John' of mar yungar
Sym of gardyn alexander androson' Wat rolland Stevyn giffard and othir sindri

In the balye court haldin in the tolbuthe the xxiiij day of Jule the yer' of god
et cetera lxxviij yeris James crag skynnar' has fundin John' of Knollis borch
for him tocompere before the ballies in the tolbuthe of this burgh this day
xv dais til answer' at the instance of James cumming ane of the balyeis
wpon' the wrangwis' halding of viij eln' and iij quarteris of chamblot as law wil

the same dai the assise fand and deliuerit that Dauid symson tuke fra John' of Knollis
the half teynd of the Crois for this yeris fisching / for the quhilk the assise
ordanit that he suld pay alsmekle to John' of Knollis as Alexander hay wald
swere that he gef for the same the yer' of before / And than incontinent the
said Alexander present deponit be his aith . that he gef tharfor til the said John' of
Knollis vj barrelis of salmond and that Johne of Knollis gef him v merkis of siluer agane

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio coram ballivis eiusdem xxvijo die Julij
anno Domini supradicto.

quo die ballivi assignauerunt alexandro de marr' fabro
hodie ad octo dies peremptorie ad respondendum Alano smyth super plegio per ipsum alanum super
dictum alexandrum porrecto in manu philippi Dunbrek sergeandi / et quod producat compu
ta sua illo die prout voluerit perdere et lucrare seu desuper deseruiri

Eodem die Johannes sclatar' belman conuictus per assisam amerciatur pro iniusta perturbacione
et lesione Johannis sclatar manentis in via castri et emendabit eidem Juridice
Item alter Johannes sclatar in amerciamento pro perturbacione predicti Johannis sclatar belman commorantis in
vico inferiori ecclesie ut compertum fuit per assisam et emendabit ut supra

Item eodem die Dauid talyour deuenit plegius legalis pro Johanne sclatar' belman quod alter
Johannes sclatar in vico castri erit indempnis aliter quam Jura volunt Similiter idem
Johannes sclatar inuenit Johannem more plegium legalem pro eo de indempnitate Johannis sclatar'
belman aliter quam per viam Juris

Curia legalis burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio coram ballivis eiusdem iijo die
Augusti anno et cetera lxxviijuo /

quo die thomas palframan amerciatur pro foristallacione et emp
cione farine in foro ante horam statutam per concessionem suam propriam et cetera
Eodem die Alanus smyth in amerciamento pro iniusta prosecucione Alexandri de mar fabri pro ix d'

Die quinta Augusti predicti Alexander rede deuenit plegius legalis pro petro nauta
quod Willelmus rede erit indempnis de eo aliter quam per viam Juris
Curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio vijo die Augusti anno et cetera lxxviijo /

quo die petrus
nauta et Willelmus rede amerciantur pro perturbacione adinuicem et cetera

The quhilk day anent the action movit be James cummyne aganis James crag of
the wrangwis' halding of viij eln' and iij quartaris of chamblot It was ordanit and
deliuerit be ane sworne assise that gif James crag wil bring ane certificacion
vndir the seil of the aldirman or ane of the balyeis of Elgyne before the
balyeis of Abirdene within xl dais / that the said chamlat was stollin fra the
said James crag in the merket and that he had na profit nor gude tharof And
falyeand of the said certificacion that he bring ane sufficiant man vnsus
pect in ilke hand within the said tym toswer' with him as foresaid is / he
salbe quite of the said chamlat and clame tharof And falyeand of his production
of the certificacion or witnes' in maner before writin the assise has ordanit
him to pay the price of the said chamlat til James cuming forsaid

Eodem die Willelmus de Kyntor deuenit plegius legalis pro Jacobo cummyng quod Jacobus
crag erit indempnis aliter quam per viam Juris

Item vxores Johannis sincler' Roberti Kintor et Duncanj smyth ac megota Waus
amerciantur pro propinacione lagene ceruisie pro xvj d' per concessiones proprias et cetera

xiiijto die Augusti anno predicto coram prepositi et ballivis ac multis aliis Willelmus de Keith
filius et heres apparens gilberti Keith de Inuerugy militis inuenit patricium
badenagh plegium legalem pro eo quod Thomas symson erit indempnis aliter
quam per viam Juris Et similiter Alexander rede deuenit plegius legalis pro dicto thoma symson
de indempnitate prefati Willelmi de Keith aliter quam per viam Juris

add.foreign: compromissum inter procuratorem David crukschank et thomam simson

div.p:
The same day It is appointit and accordit betuix ane nobil squyer William of
Keith of the son and apperand ayr til ser Gilbert of Keith of Inuerugy
knycht and procuratour and assignay til Dauid crukschank burges of Abirdene on
that a part And Thomas symson for him and Jonet fichet his spous'
than beand present on that vthir part / concerning the debatis and pley of certan landis and
Croftis within and besyde the said burgh in maner' fourme and effect as eftre
folowis that is tosay / that the saidis parties with ane assent and consent
ar compromittit and oblist be the faith of thar bodiis / that thai sal vndirly / and
abyde at the deliuerance and determinacion of the common consale writin in this
common buke and chosin for this instant yer' that beis present and may be our'
tane for the tyme / quhilkis salbe sworn to the finale determinacione
and conclusione of the said debatis and pleyis as ane assise And til entir
in the tolbuthe of Abirdene on tiisday the xviij day of this instant moneth
of August / bringand with thame al euidentis chartiris lettres documentis
munimentis and Instrumentis sic as thai wil tyne and wyn with that day
as day peremptour And gif the said William of Keith producis or bringis
ony prefis or witnes' before the said assise thai beand sworn' the
gret aith / that the assise sal admyt thare deposiciones in sa fer as
thai ar of vale

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio coram preposito et ballivis eiusdem xviijo die
mensis Augusti anno Domini et cetera lxxviijuo

Quo die Willelmus cumyne de cult'
inuenit Johannem de marr' plegium legalem pro eo quod Thomas symson' erit
indempnis aliter quam per viam Juris Et eodemmodo Willelmus blindsele iunior deuenit
plegius legalis pro thoma symson' de indempnitate prefati Willelmi cumyng ut supra

The same day the hail communitee of this burgh beand gaddirit in the tolbuth'
inquirit quhethir the x lastis of salmond last promittit be the toune til a maist
Reuerend fadir the Archbischop of SanctAndrois was a common action or nocht
the quhilkis deliueryt and sayde that it was a common actione / and that the
personis that the said salmond was extentit on suld be distressit tharfor

Item the same day It is consentit and concludit be the consale and communite that
the ten markis that ser henry hervy had be the toune of the Justice myln
and the ten merkis that ser Androw thomson has of the toune rychtsa gif thai
may be gottin be annext and assignit til the wark and biging of the qvere
togiddir with al vthir proffit that may be gottin be the avise and ordinance of
the common consale of this burgh

The same day This is the decrete and determinacion made be John' of mar'
Johne of Knollis Dauid colison thomas fife thomas of chavmer gilbert vaus'
Alexander howison thomas prat Alexander rede John' of Kyntor Dauid symson
Edmond lowson gilbert of chavmer Adam of crafurd Dauid Kyntor
Robert of cullan and John' the vaus' burgess' of Abirdene sworn and chosin
to declare and determyne the debatis and pley of certane landis and croftis liand
within and besyde the burgh of Abirdene / betuix William of Keith son and appe
rand ayr til ser gilbert of Keith of Inuerugy knycht and procuratour and assigna
til Dauid crukschank burges of Abirdene on that a part And Thomas
symson for him and Jonet fichet his spous' on that vthir part / The quhilkis
avisitly be thare athes fand determynyt and pronuncit / that the said Janet
fichet has right til al landis croftis and annuale Rentis clamyt be Da
uid cruikschank and his procuratouris / except the Bern and the tayl stre
kand to the kingis gate conquest be John' edwardson quhilum burges
of Abirdene fra thomas of chavmyr

Item the said day Duncan of sanchar' of murcroft has fundyn William blindsele
yungar borgh for him topay til Robert redehede as procuratour til Dauid cruke
schank xx s' within xv dais eftir the hame cumming of thom of mar' falyeand
that he preve nocht within the said xv dais eftir his hame cuming / that the said thomas
pait the said xx s' til Dauid crukschank on the behalf of the said Duncan

Curia burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio coram preposito et ballivis eiusdem xxjo die mensis
Augusti anno et cetera lxxviijuo /

quo die Alexander mowat de loscragy porrexit
plegium in manu Duncanj stralogh seriandi / super Jacobum de Kyntor quod iniuste
detinet ab eo tres barellas salmonum / qui quidem Jacobus peciit diem legalem
ad respondendum plegio / qui quidem prepositus et ballivi sibi assignarunt hodie ad quindenam
et dictus Jacobus inuenit Andream branche plegium ad respondendum dicto plegio in forma Juris

Eodem die dictus Alexander mowat constituit Patricium badenagh suum legittimum
procuratorem ad prosequendum Jacobum Kintor de dictis tribus barellis salmonum in forma
Juris ipso promittens de Rato et cetera

Item eodem die magnus Wormot clamavit thomam symson' de certo naulo exten
den' ad xviij s' dicto thoma negante / qui quidem actio posita fuit ad assisam
proborum virorum / que quidem assisa mature auisata decreuit et deliberavit
Ipsum thomam fore quitum de dicto clameo summe predicte / et quod huiusmodi actio
pendebat inter Jacobum de Kintor et Dauid Kyntor

In curia ballivorum tenta in pretorio xxijo die Augusti anno predicto Robertus burnet
et henricus mortimar' adiudicatur videlicet eorum quilibet in amerciamento pro perturbacione adinuicem prout
compertum fuit per assisam et emendabit alter alteri ut Jura volunt vnde pro dicto
Roberto Andreas Kymdy deuenit plegius legalis de indempnitate henrici mortimar
aliter quam per viam Juris Et eodemmodo David hil deuenit plegius legalis pro dicto henrico et cetera
